name: Iluju Kiringa
content: Iluju Kiringa Iluju Kiringa Professor / Professeur Ph.D. (University of Toronto) M.Sc. (Dipl. Inf.), M.A. (University of Bonn) Research Databases: Business Intelligence, Multidatabases, Data Sharing, Peer-to-Peer Databases, Active Databases, Transaction Models, IoT Data Management, IoT Systems Peer-to-Peer Systems: e-Commerce on Peer-to-Peer Systems, Peer Social Networks Artificial Intelligence: Knowledge Representation, Reasoning about Actions PUBLICATIONS / Projects: Hyperion , Business Intelligence Network Honours Projects (New projects added!) / M.Sc./Ph.D. Topics Students / Useful links Courses, and Topics for Projects / Theses Present: CSI3130, CSI3530 Past at UofO: CSI3130, CSI3530, CSI3540, CSI5311, CSI3130, CSI3530, CSI5311, CSI3130, CSI3530, CSI2532, CSI5311, CSI3130, CSI3530 CSI2532, CSI5140 A, CSI3130, CSI3530 CSI5311, CSI3140, CSI3540, CSI2532, CSI3530, CSI5140 H, CSI3130, CSI3530, CSI2532, CSI5140 A, CSI3530, CSI2532, CSI5311(5x), CSI3317, CSI3317 (3x), CSI3717 (3x), CSI2531 Past at UofT: CSC324 (2x), CSC326, CSC270 Role Models: Ray Reiter, A. Schoenhage, M. Tshiamalenga, ... Conference links: KR'06, VLDB'05, PAKM'06 Iluju Kiringa School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) University of Ottawa, 800 King Edward St. Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1N 6N5 Tel: +1 (613) 562-5800 ext. 2123 / Fax: +1 (613) 562-5664 Office: SITE Building, Room 5072 / Email: kiringa@eecs.uottawa.ca
